p: The centrality of compliance and conflict is critical in the analysis of risks and opportunities from increasing markets for natural products, such as the integration of endemic medicinal plants into the global value chains. In extending this argument, we review institutional frameworks in natural resource management, the global medicinal plant value chain and how these are impacted by the triumvirate of knowledge, power and subjectivity. The framework is in the next section adapted to extend our argument about institutional frameworks in Natural Resource management in general and Common Property Resources (CPRs), such as medicinal plants in particular.
